title: Happy Mothers Day To All Mums
description:
Happy Mothers Day To All Mums 
You are special , you are the one who gave birth to us.
You are the one who may have gone through hardships to get us to where we are today. 
You may have never given up on us.
You only wanted the best for us.

‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

To all the working mums you are extremely special as you juggle many roles and responsibilities.

You are doing your very best. You are a champion, give yourself a treat as well. 
You deserve this. 

Have a special day MUM‚Äôsüåπ

Have a special day MUM‚Äôsüåπ
raw_jsonld.transcript: Happy Mother's Day to all the beautiful moms out there. Being a mom is not always easy. So many roles and responsibilities. Being the wife, being the partner, looking after the children, maybe taking them to school, bringing them back and then doing your duties as their work business mom. And we know that it's not always easy. The responsibilities go further than that because of so many chores to do in the house. We look after other family members and running a business too. So I just want to say you deserve to have the most beautiful day. Enjoy every moment of it and remember you deserve being pampered. Whether it's flowers, chocolates or a meal out or some fizz, enjoy the day-to-day. So from one month to another, I want to wish you the best, happiest and happiest of Mother's Day memories and cherish them. We are so special. We deserve to commend ourselves and to give ourselves a pat on the back to say I did this too. Thank you and enjoy your day.
